column4: Why is my mic not working in 64-bit when it worked in 32-bit Fedora?
Everything is turned up in Alsamixer.
I can't imagine why I would need drivers for a soundcard that's worked fine in everything else, not to mention that sound output works perfectly.
now check all settings.  you can navigate with the arrow keys
I'm not exactly new. ;) Everything is at 100%.
take special care about the boosters and also check if nothing is muted
but still it might be possible that do forgot to enable capture for the mic
but after 5 minutes i stoped reading his messages and threw a D<))))8> for the troll
so i guess you allready tried lspci and stuff?
so the laptop/compters mic does not work but if you use a headset it works?
